LanguageData.Permit_CallShuttle.root.nodes.0.name: shuttleReturnDays
LanguageData.Permit_CallShuttle.root.nodes.1.name: goodwillChangeOnShuttleDestroyed
LanguageData.Permit_CallShuttle.root.nodes.4.label: Shuttle arrived
LanguageData.Permit_CallShuttle.root.nodes.4.text: The shuttle called by [asker_nameDef] has arrived.\n\nIf you don't use the shuttle, it will return to [permitFaction_name] in [shuttleReturnDays] days.
LanguageData.Permit_CallShuttle.root.nodes.6.node.nod: The shuttle from [permitFaction_name] has departed after being made to wait for too long.
LanguageData.Permit_CallLaborers.root.nodes.10.label: Laborers arrived
LanguageData.Permit_CallLaborers.root.nodes.10.text: The laborers from [permitFaction_name] have arrived. A shuttle will come to collect them in [laborersDurationDays] days.
LanguageData.Permit_CallLaborers.root.nodes.12.node.n: A shuttle has arrived to collect the laborers from [permitFaction_name].
LanguageData.Permit_CallLaborers.root.nodes.13.name: goodwillPenaltyPawn
LanguageData.Permit_CallLaborers.root.nodes.14.name: goodwillChangeOnShuttleDestroyed
LanguageData.Permit_CallLaborers.root.nodes.15.node.n: A laborer sent to you by [permitFaction_name] has died. Your goodwill with [permitFaction_name] has fallen by [goodwillPenaltyPawn].
